review: I found this really helpful because the 2 things that I use the most are NetFlix and YouTube. There is an added value to this, my phone is the control. I have this set up to my VIZIO M401i-A3 40-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV and I am using Chromecast because the control for the tv sucks. With the ability to use my phone as the control I have all the control in the world and all the apps that I need.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I would recommend it to anyone who really enjoys or uses YouTube. It is the best working feature it has. Watching Netflix is a pain in the @ss sometimes, just doesn't work, and when watching YouTube videos, even after closing YouTube and turning (Completely off, not standby) off my iPad the video keeps running sometimes. Besides that, its s cheap nifty way to add some IQ to your TV as long as it has a HDMI port and that you have where to plug the UBS or AC adapter (Because yes, it need juice to function, and it does not come from the HDMI port, so youll have to plug it in the wall or a USB port on the TV etc.).
